name: Evan Phoenix
quote: With friends like Travis CI, we can't loose!

name: José Valim
quote: Travis is like Github for CIs. So easy to setup that everyone does it.

name: Ryan Bates
quote: @travisci I love what you're doing, keep up the great work!

name: Nick Quaranto
quote: I must say, I was skeptical, but @travisci is awesome.

name: Aslak Hellesoy
quote: I have used many CI systems, but Travis is the most awesome one so far!!

name: Brian Ford
quote: Travis-CI is simply killin it! What a terrific resource this will be for Ruby and other communities.

name: Sean Cribbs
quote: If you haven't tried yet, do put your project on @travisci. Awesome app with many nice people behind it.

name: Roberto Decurnex
quote: After Github I think this is the second best free service I have ever seen!

name: Jeff Casimir
quote: I'm sure there was life before @travisci, but I choose to ignore it.

name: Durran Jordan
quote: @travisci thank you for the incredible service!

name: Assaf Arkin
quote: Travis CI is a no brainer. It’s free. It works. It’s trivial to setup.

name: Fabio Kuhn
quote: Big ♥ to @travisci for that awesome and free CI service.

name: Ben Hoskings
quote: Oh man, @travisci is a friggin' marvel. So good.
